info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 31 at 8:16PM PDT until August 31 at 9:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR SAN BERNARDINO COUNTY... At 816 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain. These storms are weakening and moving out of the warned area, but runoff could still be producing flash flood impacts. HAZARD...Runoff from flash flooding caused by earlier thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks, streams, and washes. Some streets and low-water crossings may be overcome by flowing water. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Cima, Mid Hills Campground, Nipton And Ivanpah Roads, Nipton, Black Canyon Equestrian Campground and Hole In The Wall Campground. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
